polu, bayisikal ෙchn ha bothal upayogi kara ganimin pahara dim sidu kara athi athara ema awasthawe di wishwawidyalaye gruhastha kridagarayata ha widuli pahan kihipayakata alabha hani sidu wi athayi wishwawidyalayiya aaranchi marga pawasiya.

loka samaya wenuwen peni sitina bawa penwamin amerikawa karanne manawa himikam ullanghanaya kirima bawa amerikawe hitapu janadhipathiwarayaku wu jimi katar mahatha niwyork tayims puwathpathata prakasha kara thibe.thrasthawadaya madalima sandaha amerikawa ganna kriyamargawaladi barapathala lesa manawa himikam ullanghanaya wi athi bawa hethema kiweya.niyamuwan rahitha yanawalin menma hamuda meheyumwalin kanthawan ha lamayin da athuluwa siwil wasiyan wishala washayen jiwithakshayata pathwana bawa penwa di athi katar mahatha ema ahinsaka siwil wasiyan sathuran wanne kesedayi erata rajayen prashna kara sitina bawada prakasha kara thibe.mema wasara thula amerika aarakshaka ansha afganisthanaya, pakisthanaya, somaliyawa, yemanaya athulu ratawal kihipayakata guwan prahara ella karamin sitina bawath, amerika hamudawa ella karana praharawalin miya yana siwil wasiyan pilibanda haki nam niwaradi sankhya lekhana wartha idiripath karana lesath jimi katar mahatha amerika palanayata abhiyoga kara thibe.purna washayen manawa himikam surakina bawata lokayata sahathikayak labadi athi amerikawa mema kriyakalapaya haraha lokayata waradi purwadarshayak sapayana bawath, thawath athakin eya loka samaye sathuranta anubaladimak bawath hitapu janadhipathiwaraya niwyork tayims puwathpathata wadiduratath prakashakara thibe..
rohitha gitarayak ragena with githa gayamin upandinaya samaranna wiya.
aththatama lajjashili ganu lamayi godak welawata sahayaka daniyek ekkamane thaman kamathi kolla ekka katha karanna wunath set wenne.

oya despalu wada wagema rate siddhawena noyekuth waradi dewal gana kathakaranna thamayi me bloga mama patan gaththe..hinalanthaya kiyala nama dammeth hinalanthaya kiyana rate mewwa me widihayi..ithin ape rateth mehema karamu kiyana yojanawa genna thamayi mama hithuwe..

eka bhawayakadi aa ithama buddhimath amara dewiya lesath, thawath bhawayakadi rajawu bodhisathwayinta aga bisawa lesath wagema kusa kumarayata pabawathi lesath padumuththara kumarayata bisawa lesath washayen wiwidha bhumikawan walata panapowanawa.

lokaye kunu prashnaya balapa aththe apa jiwathwana godabimata pamanak nowa, me wanawita sagarayada kunu prashnayen dadiwa batakamata sagarayata ekathuwa wana plastik apadrawya hethu wana bawa norahasaki.

ema nisa ‘chethanahan bhikkha we kamman wadami’ methanata adalaya.
esema, ee hama awasthawe di ma, ohu (saha ohuge tharaga sagaya) paradunaha.
ee anuwa sangnya sukshamanshu nipadawima wadi kerena athara eyin aantha්ra aastharanaye winiwida yame hakiyawa adu kara asathmikathawa walakwanawa.

anna niyama porawal..
apa wihilu karanawa da kiyala ahuwa.
ee ha samanga ranakami bawa da pa්rakata wiya.

- rajge nawathana lot anka deka - pahaloswani muraya kola pata la dalu aga randi pini bindithi ralu polowata adiya thiyanne parissaminya..handawe kalayen gena wathura the pala walata isa awasanwa lalitha geta goda wadune thunatiya athagamini..pala thawana asala kelin katin indagena alu kola athagamin siti ayiwan bara kalpanawakin atharaman wi sitiyi..akkarayak tharam eli kala idame me kuda pala haritha saluwak porawana sitinu ohuta mawi peneyi..arimbu pupura eliyata adena kuda the kola hiru eliyata sinasenu balannata ohu thula aththe nothith aashawaki..ala bathala hituwa pas peralamin gewunu lama kalayata thitha thabamin the akkarayak waga karaganimata labima thama sathu wasanawa bawa ohuta hage..udasanama manis samaga hulan galata gos kapagena aa rilla mitiya gena lesama pasekin thibe..the thawana hewana kirimata rilla athu parissamata pala atharin gasiya yuthu aakaraya the mahaththayagen danagannata labune giya samithi warayeya..the pala wadath surakshithawa wadenneth hiru eliyata pichchi noyanneth ee nisaya..

aya an aya sahaya awashya wita handuna ganimata bhayankara hakiyawa athi athara, eya methek wachana ho samahara bahira prakashanayan ikmawa yayi.

subhashini jayarathna hambanthota sita...hambanthota waraya aashi්rathawa idiwemin pawathina thel tanki daha hatharakin yuth athi wishala thel gabada sankirnaye idikirim katayuthu me wana wita siyayata haththapahakin pamana nima wemin athayi da ee anuwa me wasare agosthu wana wita idikirim katayuthu mulumaninma nima kota thel sapayime sewa katayuthu aarambha kirimata haki wethayi ehi pradhana injineru anil hewagigana mahatha pawasayi.dolar miliyana 76 ka wiyadamin idikarena mema thel gabada sankirnaye siyalu katayuthu apekshitha kalayakata pera awasan kirimata hakiwima suwisheshathwayaki.naw sandaha thel tanki atak da gas sandaha tanki thunak da guwan yana thel tanki thunak da athi athara thel laba ganime saha thel beda harima sandaha prayojanayata gane.naw sandaha thel kiyubik litar 51,000 ka dharithawak da guwan yana sandaha thel kiyubik litar 25000 dharithawak da el. pi. ji. gas kiyubik litar 6000 dharithawak da mema tankiwala gabada kala hakiya.karthruta liyanna | mudranaya sandaha
